//Generated by BehavEd

declare ( /*@DECLARE_TYPE*/ FLOAT, "whereto" );
set ( "whereto", $random( 0, 3 )$ );
set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
set ( "SET_DEATH_SCRIPT", "finca1/spawnguy" );

task ( "runim" )
{
	set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "10 - Emergency" );
	set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );

	if ( $get( FLOAT, "zone")$, $=$, $1.000$ )
	{

		if ( $get( FLOAT, "whereto")$, $>$, $2.000$ )
		{
			set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone1targetA" );
		}


		else (  )
		{

			if ( $get( FLOAT, "whereto")$, $>$, $1.000$ )
			{
				set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone1targetB" );
			}


			else (  )
			{
				set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone1targetC" );
			}

		}

	}


	if ( $get( FLOAT, "zone")$, $=$, $2.000$ )

			}

		}

			}


			else (  )
			{
				set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone3targetC" );
			}

		}

	}


	if ( $get( FLOAT, "zone")$, $=$, $4.000$ )

			set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone4targetA" );

		else (  )

			}


			else (  )
			{
				set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone4targetC" );
			}

		}

	}


	if ( $get( FLOAT, "zone")$, $=$, $5.000$ )
	{

		if ( $get( FLOAT, "whereto")$, $>$, $2.000$ )
		{
			set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone5targetA" );
		}


		else (  )
		{

			if ( $get( FLOAT, "whereto")$, $>$, $1.000$ )
			{
				set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone5targetB" );

			else (  )
			{
				set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone5targetC" );

			set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone6targetA" );

		else (  )
		{

			if ( $get( FLOAT, "whereto")$, $>$, $1.000$ )
			{
				set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone6targetB" );
			}


			else (  )
			{
				set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "zone6targetC" );
			}

		}
